comment.author: 62104855@N04
comment._content: As i kept seeing the living creatures,why,look!There was one wheel on the earth besides the living creatures,by the four faces of each.As for the appearance of the wheels and their structure,it was like the glow of chrys'olite;and the four of them had one likeness.And their appearance and their structure were just as when a wheel proved to be in the midst of a wheel.
